title: Buy an auction using Buy Now
description: Buys an item using Buy Now.
permission_required: BiddingAndBuying: Place bids, and complete purchases using Buy Now & Fixed Price Offers.

enum.name: xml
enum.description: Serialize responses into XML.

enum.name: json
enum.description: Serialize responses into JSON.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of the listing the Buy Now request is for.

fields.name: ShippingOption
fields.description: The ID of the preferred shipping option which will be used if the Buy Now request succeeds. This ID can be retrieved from the ShippingId field in the listing detail.

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: The quantity to buy. Defaults to 1. Only applicable to Buy Now Only auctions.

fields.name: FirearmsLicence
fields.description: The user's firearms licence number. This is required for firearms purchases.

fields.name: FirearmsLicenceHolder
fields.description: The user Enters First, Middle, and Last Names associated to the firearms licence.

fields.name: FirstName
FirstName
fields.description: First name of Licence Holder. Required;

fields.name: MiddleNames
fields.description: Middle Names of Licence Holder. Optional;

fields.name: LastName
fields.description: Last name of Licence Holder. Required;

fields.name: IsBuyerOlderThan18
fields.description: The user agrees they are older than 18. This is required for wine purchases.

fields.name: ReturnListingDetails
fields.description: Indicates whether full listing details should be returned in the response.

fields.name: ReferringSearchQueryId
fields.description: The search query ID for the search which referred the user to the listing.

returns.description: <BuyNowResponse> The details of the Buy Now request.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: StatusCode
fields.description: The status of the Buy Now request.

enum.name: Success
enum.description: The bid was a success.

enum.name: None
enum.description: The bid had some other error.

enum.name: ReserveMet
enum.description: The reserve was met.

enum.name: ErrorAccountDisabled
enum.description: The buyer account is disabled.

enum.name: ReserveNotMet
enum.description: The reserve was not met.

enum.name: ErrorBadMemberDetails
enum.description: Not a member.

enum.name: ReserveMetAutoBidGreaterThanReserve
enum.description: The auto bid was higher than the reserve.

enum.name: ErrorHeavyQuarantine
enum.description: Needs proof of goods.

enum.name: ReserveMetAutoBidIncreased
enum.description: The autobid was increased.

enum.name: ReserveNotMetAutoBid
enum.description: An autobid did not met the reserve.

enum.name: ReserveMetExistingAutoBidGreaterThanBid
enum.description: Someone else has a higher bid which mets the reserve.

enum.name: ErrorOwnAuction
enum.description: This is an auction owed by the member.

enum.name: ReserveNotMetExistingAutoBidGreaterThanBid
enum.description: Someone else has a higher bid and the reserve is not met.

enum.name: ErrorBlacklisted
enum.description: The member has been blacklisted by the seller.

enum.name: ReserveMetExistingAutoBidEqualToBid
enum.description: The reserve is met and the auto bids match.

enum.name: ErrorAuthenticatedMembersOnlyAuction
enum.description: The member needs to be authenticated to bid.

enum.name: ReserveNotMetExistingAutoBidEqualToBid
enum.description: The reserve is not met and the auto bids match.

enum.name: ErrorAccountIndebt
enum.description: The accountis in debt and can not bid.

enum.name: ReserveMetAutoBid
enum.description: The reserve is met by an auto bid.

enum.name: ErrorBidTooHigh
enum.description: The bid is too high for our rules.

enum.name: ErrorBidLessThanMinimumNextBid
enum.description: The bid is too low.

enum.name: ErrorBidLessThanFiftyCents
enum.description: Bid needs to be higher than 50c.

enum.name: ErrorBidLessThanStartPrice
enum.description: The bid must be greater than the start price.

enum.name: ErrorTooManyBids
enum.description: There have been too many bids from the member in the last 24 hours.

enum.name: ErrorHasTopAutoBid
enum.description: The member already has the top autobid.

enum.name: ErrorAuctionClosed
enum.description: The auction is closed.

enum.name: ErrorDatabase
enum.description: There was an error in the database.

enum.name: ErrorListingAcceptsBuyNowOnly
enum.description: Attempting to bid on a listing that can't be bidded on.

enum.name: ErrorQuantityInvalid
enum.description: Quantity is either less than 1 or greater than the maximum.

enum.name: ErrorListingIsAClassified
enum.description: Attempting to bid on a classified listing.

enum.name: ErrorInvalidShipping
enum.description: Invalid shipping ID.

enum.name: ErrorInvalidFirearmsLicense
enum.description: Invalid or missing firearms license number.

enum.name: ErrorAgeConfirmationRequired
enum.description: Age confirmation is required for this listing.

enum.name: ErrorListingAcceptsPayNowOnly
enum.description: Attempting to buy a listing that can only be paid for by pay now

enum.name: ErrorBuyProcessBan
enum.description: Attempting to bid or buy now when member has been purchase banned.

enum.name: AutoBidDecreased
enum.description: The autobid was decreased.

fields.name: PurchaseId
fields.description: The ID of the purchase that was just made.

fields.name: Listing
fields.description: The state of the listing, after the Buy Now has successfully completed. This field is only present if the ReturnListingDetails parameter is true and the Buy Now operation was successful. This field will also be missing if there was an error retrieving the listing details. For more information on this field, see the documentation for the listing details API.
